args:
Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no".
Senator-designates Ashley Moody (R-Florida), Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis’s choice to replace Secretary of State Marco Rubio,...
Senator-designates Ashley Moody (R-Florida), Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis’s choice to replace Secretary of State Marco Rubio, and Jon Husted (R-Ohio), Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine’s choice to replace Vice President JD Vance, are both scheduled to be sworn in to the Senate on Tuesday afternoon.
“Both our new senators bring valuable experience, expertise, and perspective to the Senate Republican majority, and the whole Senate will benefit from them joining our ranks,” said Senate Majority Leader John Thune (R-South Dakota) on the Senate floor earlier Tuesday.
